thamage gedarin pitatha giya wita noyek thanwala di boho aahara panadiya labima, ohu nisa (ee maithri karana thanaththa aashraya karagena) boho dena jiwath wana bawa, giya giya gam ratawaladi puja sathkara labima, ohu kara sorun lan nowima, rajugenuth awaman nolabima, kisi sathureku nathi wima, sabhawakata pamini wita owunowun wisin sathutu karanu labima, siyalu nayan athuren uthumaku wima, guna kirthi usulannaku wima, aishwaryayen babalannaku wima, sapathin paha nowima, gawayan bowima, kumbauru saru wima, daruwangen sapa windinnata labima, pihita nathi thanwala di pawa pihita labima, sathuranta mada pawathwiya nohaki keneku wima aadiyayi.
